segments.text: Excuse me . Can I open a postal savings account in your office ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . What kind of postal savings account do you want to open ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hum .. Can you recommend me one with high interest ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . We offer a few different kinds of postal saving services . They have different interest rates .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want the one with the highest interest rate .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That would be our Savers Plus account . You must pay 10 000 yuan into your deposit account . In this way you can get 5 % dividend at the end of the year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . I'II open this one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just fill out these forms , and I â€™ ll be with you in one second .
segments.speaker: S2
